message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can come to an agreement at $130 for the product.

Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your interest.  While $150 is a fair starting point considering its value, I could meet you at $140. I'm confident you won't find this kind of quality for a better price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $135 for the product.
